summary: This module contains unit tests that verify the Checkov S3 encryption rule for AWS CloudFormation templates. It runs the Checkov runner against sample templates, applies filters, and asserts that the encryption check correctly identifies compliant and non‑compliant S3 bucket configurations.
business_intent: Validate that infrastructure-as-code templates enforce server‑side encryption on S3 buckets, helping organizations meet security and compliance requirements for data protection.
